QuestData.Title: Vaelen Has Returned
QuestData.Description: I just saw that incompetent fool, Vaelen the Flayed, sneak into the vault building.$B$BGo see to it that he rectifies his mistake and returns my death knights to me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vaelen the Flayed at The Shadow Vault.
QuestData.RewardText: I think I can guess why you're here, $n.
